alert.note: Alert for Collin; Dallas; Denton; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 10:57AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Denton, eastern Tarrant, southwestern Collin and Dallas Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1056 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cross Roads to Colleyville to Rendon. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington, Plano, Garland, Irving, Grand Prairie, McKinney, Carrollton, Frisco, Denton, Richardson, Lewisville, Allen, Flower Mound, Mansfield, Euless, Desoto, Bedford and Grapevine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 412 and 460. Interstate 20 between mile markers 439 and 472. Interstate 30 between mile markers 18 and 53. Interstate 45 between mile markers 276 and 284. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
